field_descriptions.token: The token used for this land. You pay taxes in this token.
field_descriptions.stake: Your deposited funds. Taxes are paid from this. When it runs out, your land gets nuked!
field_descriptions.sell_price: The price others must pay to buy your land. Higher price = higher taxes.
field_descriptions.income: What you earn per hour from neighboring lands paying taxes to you.
field_descriptions.outgoing: What you pay per hour in taxes to your neighbors.
field_descriptions.earnings: Your net profit or loss per hour (income minus outgoing costs).
field_descriptions.nuke: Time until your land explodes if stake runs out. Add more stake to extend this!

tax_field_descriptions.neighbors_slider: Adjust this to simulate different neighbor scenarios. More neighbors = more taxes you pay, but also more potential income!
tax_field_descriptions.net_yield: Your hourly profit or loss. Green means you're earning more than you're paying in taxes. Red means you're losing money!
tax_field_descriptions.payback_time: How long until your yield covers the land purchase cost. Shorter is better!
tax_field_descriptions.nuke_time: How long your stake will last before running out. When it hits zero, your land gets nuked!
tax_field_descriptions.sell_profit: What you'll receive if someone buys your land (minus the 5% fee). Compare this to what you paid!

steps.text:
Welcome to PonziLand!

In PonziLand, you stake tokens on land to earn from your neighbors - but they earn from you too!

Let's learn the basics in this sandbox with fake tokens.

steps._comment: Point to first auction - only auction visible
steps.text:
See that construction site? That's an auction - a piece of land waiting to be claimed!

Click on it to buy your first land.

Set your sell price - this is what others pay to buy your land.

Don't worry about the other options for now. Just pick a price and hit Buy Now!

steps._comment: First purchase complete - explain land ownership
steps.text:
You own your first land! The building shows it's yours.

Look - a new auction just appeared nearby! Auctions spawn randomly next to active lands.

This auction is in a different token (LORDS). Each land can use different tokens!

Click on it to buy it.

Same process - set your sell price and buy!

Notice the token is different. Your stake will be in LORDS for this land.

Now you own two lands in different tokens!

Let's learn about taxes. Click on your first land (at the center) to see how it's performing.

This is your land's info panel.

- Stake: Your fuel to pay taxes
- Earnings: Income minus costs
- Nuke time: When stake runs out, you lose the land!

steps._comment: Spawn neighbors and explain multiple tokens
steps.text:
Now your land has neighbors! Each neighbor pays you taxes based on their sell price.

But notice - they use different tokens. You receive taxes in each neighbor's token!
Want to see the breakdown by token? Click the eye icon to toggle Pro Mode!

Pro Mode shows exactly how much you earn from each neighbor in their token.

This helps you track your multi-token portfolio!

A new auction appeared! This time, let's do a full purchase with all the options.

Click on the new auction (top-left area).

Now you see the full buy options:

- Token: Choose which token to stake
- Sell Price: What others pay for your land
- Stake: Your tax fuel (more = longer survival)
Click on Neighborhood Tax Impact to see how your settings affect survival!

This shows your projected earnings based on neighbor count.

- Green = profitable
- Red = losing money

When ready, click Buy Now!

Great! You're building an empire!

Now let's learn about shields. Click the shield icon in the top bar to see nuke times.

Uh oh! Your first land's stake is running low! See the red timer?

Open its info panel to add more stake before it gets nuked!
Use Increase Stake to add more fuel. This extends your survival time!

Look! A neighbor's land is about to be nuked!

Click the golden coin above your land to claim your taxes - this triggers their nuke!

You've mastered the basics!

Remember:
- Higher sell price = more taxes you pay
- Keep stake topped up
- Claim taxes from dying neighbors
- Diversify your token portfolio!

Good luck in PonziLand!
